remarks: Interchange class substitution and restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by NM, 18-Aug-2018.)
statement:
sbcrext $p |- ( F/_ y A -> ( [. A / x ]. E. y e. B ph <-> E. y e. B [. A / x ]. ph ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
